DOC.brief_summary: The objective study obtain female first-catch urine , vaginal swab , endocervical swab , cervical specimen collect PreservCyt Solution ( `` PreservCyt Specimens '' ) test APTIMA Trichomonas vaginalis ( ATV ) Assay . These specimen use demonstrate assay performance PANTHER System comparable performance TIGRIS System .
DOC.brief_title: Female Urine , Vaginal & Endocervical Swab & Cervical Specimen Collections APTIMA Trichomonas Vaginalis Assay Testing
DOC.criteria: Subject must female attend participate clinic Subject must least 14 year age time enrollment currently sexually active ( vaginal intercourse within past 12 month ) The subject and/or legally authorize representative willing undergo inform consent process prior study participation ( minor need document consent parent legal guardian , unless site institutional review board ( IRB ) approve waiver parental consent minor ) In addition , subject must meet least one follow criterion : Subject must demonstrate symptom consistent suspect STD vaginal odor , vaginal discharge , vaginal/vulvar itch irritation , pain/discomfort sexual intercourse urination , and/or low abdominal discomfort Subject must asymptomatic known partner , contact , person confirm suspect STD ( ) Subject must asymptomatic undergo screen evaluation possible STDs Subject must undergo Pap screen Subject take antibiotic medication within last 14 day Subject already participate study Subject history illness principal investigator ( PI ) designee considers could interfere affect conduct , result , and/or completion clinical trial Subject history illness PI designee considers could create unacceptable risk subject enrol
